title: What's news in v2.42.7
content:
- Canvas grid and guide line dimensions can be adjusted independently
- Canvas grid and guide line configuration are saved with each file instead of being a global setting
- Added layer and frame operations (creating, duplicating, and removing) to gesture pad and joystick
- Joystick max actions increased to 10
- Added some frame info to the animation drag button
- Removed the duplicated last frame in the ping-pong animation export
- Some minor UI fixes and enhancements
- Fixed some properties of tilemap layer not being carried over when converted to a regular layer
- Fixed some funkiness with the fps duration modifier
- Fixed cel opacity not working properly
- Fixed a rare crash with tileset
- Fixed indexed mode color adjustment crash
